item.title: My Airtel Woes
item.description: I had bought a new Airtel SIM on Feb 8, just after FOSSMeet was over. Why? Because my previous SIM was incompatible with my N72 (Platinium Junior, let’s call it PJ for convenience). How? It said ‘Invalid SIM’ on switching it on with the SIM (although somehow I had managed one whole semester with the same SIM in the PJ as the damned thing worked on restarting the phone 2-3 times, but in December I realized, the SIM can’t go far with PJ anymore).
